content: A new proposal has been announced: Debuggable Macro Expansions #386. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.
What about pretending that macro invocations are inlined function calls in the dwarf debuginfo?
I like that idea. How would it apply with recursive macros?
I think we can pretend every macro definition is its own function which gets inlined in many places
and treat any expansion of that macro as the same "function"
